concept.title: Known Issues in Marketing Cloud and Creative Cloud Asset Sharing
concept.shortdesc: BETA PROGRAM - Known issues in Marketing Cloud - Creative Cloud asset sharing.

li.p: Moving a shared folder inside an unshared folder removes the MAC/CC share
Moving content from a shared folder into another shared folder is not synced in the Marketing Cloud.
MAC - Asset Move Wizard scrolling issue. Resize the browser window until the grid layout takes enough space to get a vertical scroll bar. Then you can scroll down and trigger loading of next page.
MAC - Asset Move wizard broken when selecting destination.
MAC and CC sharing - cannot share assets with special characters in the filename.
MAC - Adding a comment to a shared asset from MAC results in the comment duplicated (2 or 3 times) on MAC and CC.
MAC - cannot edit (crop/rotate) or annotate a shared asset (404s).
MAC - folder/assets deleted when revoking MAC/CC share on a folder.
